Inclusive Early Childhood Education.1: Create environments that are healthy, respectful, supportive, meaningful, and challenging for all children.
Inclusive Early Childhood Education.2: Value the important and complex characteristics of children’s families and communities.
Inclusive Early Childhood Education.3: Use systematic observations, documentation, and other effective assessment strategies in partnership with families, staff, and other professionals to positively influence the development of every child.
Inclusive Early Childhood Education.4: Use supportive interactions when working with young children and families.
Inclusive Early Childhood Education.5: Design, implement, and evaluate classroom activities that promote positive development and learning for all children by selecting, adapting, and using a repertoire of evidence-based instructional strategies.
Inclusive Early Childhood Education.6: Respect and abide by the ethical and professional standards required for certification in teaching young children.
